name: sai-dashboard
description: SAI Dashboard - Visual monitoring for n8n workflow executions

scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && VITE_BASE_PATH=/dashboard/ VITE_API_URL=/dashboard/api npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf dist coverage node_modules/.cache
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf dist coverage node_modules/.cache
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: SAI Project
